channel.title: CVE Feed for ESDS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESDS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37570|2024-10-10T17:58:16.654Z -- esds -- emagic%20data%20center%20management%20suite
item.description: This vulnerability exists in ESDS Emagic Data Center Management Suit due to non-expiry of session cookie. By reusing the stolen cookie, a remote attacker could gain unauthorized access to the targeted system.

item.title: CVE-2023-37569|2024-10-10T17:58:58.986Z -- esds -- emagic%20data%20center%20management%20suite
item.description:
This vulnerability exists in ESDS Emagic Data Center Management Suit due to lack of input sanitization in its Ping component. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this by injecting OS commands on the targeted system.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on targeted system.
